1370: Niels was born in Appel Marckt in 1370.
Got married to Aghete at age 30 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Aghete, Aghete, at age 30.
1374: Had a daughter with Aghete, Emgelberna, at age 34.
1376: Had a son with Aghete, Eltetus, at age 36.
1377: Had a daughter with Aghete, Lenildis, at age 37.
1384: Had a daughter with Aghete, Eingeliadis, at age 44.
1385: Had a son with Aghete, Robbrecht, at age 45.
Lost daughter Eingeliadis when Eingeliadis was 2 years old.
Lost son Robbrecht when Robbrecht was 1 years old.
